title: Best Served Bloody
description: When thirty-eight year old Jess Green tries to start a new life in a tiny Ontario village, far away from the mad world, she learns that madness will always find her. Eleven spirits, most of them victims of one insidious murderer, inhabit the old house she bought. Until they have retribution for their deaths, theyâ€™re trapped between the mortal plane and the afterlife. Jess is their only hope.100% of profits from this novella, (author and publisher portions), go to Turning Point Domestic Violence Shelter, McHenry Co., IL
author: Sinead MacDughlas
